languages.text: "Весьма вероятно, что эта особа заслуживает сгнить здесь, захлебнуться собственной кровью или быть освежеванной ксеносами. Весьма вероятно... Но я — милосердный человек, поэтому предлагаю пристрелить ее и идти дальше".

"It is highly likely that this woman deserves to rot here and choke on her own blood or be skinned alive by the xenos. Quite likely indeed... But I am a merciful man, and therefore I suggest shooting her in the head and pressing on."
languages.original_text: "Весьма вероятно, что эта особа заслуживает сгнить здесь, захлебнуться собственной кровью или быть освежеванной ксеносами. Весьма вероятно... Но я — милосердный человек, поэтому предлагаю пристрелить ее и идти дальше".

traits.locale_text: "It is quite likely that this lady deserves to rot here, choke on her own blood or to be skinned alive by the xenos. Quite likely... But I'm a merciful person and thus I suggest to finish her off with a bullet to her head and continue on our journey."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It is quite likely that this lady deserves to rot here, choke on her own blood or to be skinned alive by the xenos. Quite likely... But I'm a merciful person and thus I suggest to finish her off with a bullet to her head and continue on our journey."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It is quite likely that this lady deserves to rot here, choke on her own blood or be skinned alive by the xenos. Quite likely... But I'm a merciful person and therefore I suggest finishing her off with a bullet to her head and continuing on our journey."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It is quite likely that this lady deserves to rot here, choke on her own blood or be skinned alive by the xenos. Quite likely... But I'm a merciful person and therefore I suggest finishing her off with a bullet to her head and continuing on our journey."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It is highly likely that this woman deserves to rot here and choke on her own blood or be skinned alive by the xenos. Quite likely indeed... But I am a merciful man, and therefore I suggest shooting her in the head and pressing on."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It is highly likely that this woman deserves to rot here and choke on her own blood or be skinned alive by the xenos. Quite likely indeed... But I am a merciful man, and therefore I suggest shooting her in the head and pressing on."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Il est fort possible que cette femme mérite de pourrir ici, de s'étouffer avec son sang ou de finir écorchée vive par les xénos. Je dirais même que c'est une certitude... mais je suis quelqu'un de clément, alors je suggère de l'achever d'une balle dans la tête avant de reprendre notre route. »
languages.original_text: "It is highly likely that this woman deserves to rot here and choke on her own blood or be skinned alive by the xenos. Quite likely indeed... But I am a merciful man, and therefore I suggest shooting her in the head and pressing on."

traits.locale_text: « Il est fort possible que cette femme mérite de pourrir ici, de s'étouffer avec son sang ou de finir écorchée vive par les xénos. Je dirais même que c'est une certitude... mais je suis quelqu'un de clément, alors je suggère de l'achever d'une balle dans la tête avant de reprendre notre route. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Es más que probable que esta señora merezca podrirse aquí, atragantarse con su propia sangre o que la despellejen viva los xenos. Más que probable, sí... Pero, soy una persona compasiva, así que sugiero que le dispare en la cabeza y sigamos adelante».
languages.original_text: "It is highly likely that this woman deserves to rot here and choke on her own blood or be skinned alive by the xenos. Quite likely indeed... But I am a merciful man, and therefore I suggest shooting her in the head and pressing on."

traits.locale_text: «Es más que probable que esta señora merezca podrirse aquí, atragantarse con su propia sangre o que la despellejen viva los xenos. Más que probable, sí... Pero, como me considero una persona piadosa, sugiero que la remate con una bala en la sien y que prosiga con sus andanzas».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “这位女士很可能会死在这里，被自己的鲜血呛死，或是被异形活活剥皮，很有可能……不过我是个仁慈的人，我建议朝她的脑袋上开一枪，继续前进。”
languages.original_text: "It is highly likely that this woman deserves to rot here and choke on her own blood or be skinned alive by the xenos. Quite likely indeed... But I am a merciful man, and therefore I suggest shooting her in the head and pressing on."

traits.locale_text: “这位女士很可能会死在这里，被自己的鲜血呛死，或是被异形活活剥皮，很有可能……不过我是个仁慈的人。我建议朝她的脑袋上开一枪，然后继续前进。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「この女性はここで朽ち果てたり、自分の血で窒息したり、あるいは異種族に生きたまま皮を剥がされるのがふさわしいように思われます。ええ、まさにそのようで…しかし、我は慈悲深い人間でございます。ですから、その頭に銃弾を撃ち込んで始末し、旅を続けることを提案します」
languages.original_text: "It is highly likely that this woman deserves to rot here and choke on her own blood or be skinned alive by the xenos. Quite likely indeed... But I am a merciful man, and therefore I suggest shooting her in the head and pressing on."

traits.locale_text: 「この女性はここで朽ち果てたり、自分の血で窒息したり、あるいは異種族に生きたまま皮を剥がされるのがふさわしいように思われます。ええ、まさにそのようで…しかし、我は慈悲深い人間でございます。ですから、その頭に銃弾を撃ち込んで始末し、旅を続けることを提案します」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Höchstwahrscheinlich hat diese Frau es verdient, hier zu verrotten, an ihrem eigenen Blut zu ersticken oder von den Xenos bei lebendigem Leib gehäutet zu werden. Höchstwahrscheinlich ... Aber ich bin ein gnädiger Mann und schlage daher vor, ihr in den Kopf zu schießen und weiterzugehen."
languages.original_text: "It is highly likely that this woman deserves to rot here and choke on her own blood or be skinned alive by the xenos. Quite likely indeed... But I am a merciful man, and therefore I suggest shooting her in the head and pressing on."

traits.locale_text: "Wahrscheinlich hat diese Dame es verdient, hier zu verrotten, an ihrem eigenen Blut zu ersticken oder von den Xenos bei lebendigem Leib gehäutet zu werden. Sehr wahrscheinlich ... Doch ich bin ein gnädiger Mann und schlage daher vor, dass wir sie mit einer Kugel in den Kopf erlösen und unsere Reise fortsetzen."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Muhtemelen bu kadın, burada çürüyüp kendi kanında boğulmayı veya zenolar tarafından canlı canlı yüzülmeyi hak ediyor. Yüksek ihtimalle hem de... Fakat ben merhametli bir adam olduğum için onu kafasından vurmayı teklif ediyorum."
languages.original_text: "It is highly likely that this woman deserves to rot here and choke on her own blood or be skinned alive by the xenos. Quite likely indeed... But I am a merciful man, and therefore I suggest shooting her in the head and pressing on."
